text: (edina) svargavasin niravasinta “apage deviyan apata laba dun porondu ættenma api dutuvemu. obat obage deviyan obata laba dun porondu ættenma oba dutuvehuda?”yi (sabda naga) vimasanu æta. eyata ovun “eseya, (laba gattemu)” yayi pavasanu æta. e atara ovun madhyaye ‘muassin’ keneku mese pavasanneya: “niyata vasayenma allahge sapaya (simava ikmava giya) aparadhakaruvan kerehi at veva!”
